item.title: Sarvara
item.description: Overview Sarvara (Sarvaran: ‘Sarvárą’ IPA: /sar.vá.rã/) was a Bronze-Age Morellic city located on the river Sarav in southern Tseireph, one of the most prominent cities of the Bronze Age.

item.title: The Sun Grows Dark
item.description: Sarvaran Text Eyúdhran ikűmma lisi̋nnanis cádra kelh ankéiranith liką́rh musápra. Oműnith íkų̈ lówerith ánïtirh éyïrath, kelh eyán ástïrilh lísï eyápąrath.
